backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report describing a feature related to removing example text from the AnniversaryGate UI.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend components, utilities, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style layer defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template loading the React app entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component gating access behind AnniversaryGate and rendering the Valentine's Week UI once unlocked.
Form-based gate that validates a text anniversary date input and unlocks the app on success.
frontend/src/components/ValentineDayCard: Card component showing each Valentine's day, handling locked/unlocked states and displaying the day's message when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider offering identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook file as no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus custom CSS variables, dark mode palettes, base styles, and romantic-themed utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/anniversaryGate.ts: Provides functions to normalize date input and validate it against the expected anniversary date.
frontend/src/lib/dateLocking.ts: Contains helpers to determine if a date is unlocked and to return a user-friendly unlock label.
frontend/src/lib/valentinesSchedule.ts: Defines the ValentineDay interface and a schedule of Valentine’s Week days with unlock dates, messages, and icon indices.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, theme extensions using CSS variables, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, features, requirements, and architectural notes for the Valentine’s Week site.
